morphInfos.tenseExplained: it is happening in the present
morphInfos.voiceExplained: it is something done to one
morphInfos.moodExplained: describing an action as something which is 'to happen'
morphInfos.personExplained: they are the ones being spoken or written to
morphInfos.caseExplained: there are two or more of them
